attributes.action: Ban the selling of display-type firworks to the general public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Supermarket and DIY chains are selling large display-type fireworks to the general public.  We would like this practice banned.  Persons wishing to purchase display firworks should be licenced to use them, and have an appropriate permit for intended use at an organised public event.
